title: Dish Network still reeling from week-old ransomware attack
description: BOSTON — The TV provider Dish Network continued to recover Wednesday from a ransomware attack last week that it said disrupted operations, internet sites and call centers.

title: TikTok is rolling out screen time limits and expanding family pairing
description: TikTok is rolling out new features to curb screen time and expand parental involvement via family pairing.

title: Hoda Kotb handling family health matter
description: "TODAY" co-anchor Hoda Kotb has been away from the broadcast to handle a family health matter.

title: Could TikTok be banned in the U.S. for good?
description: The social media giant TikTok is the latest front in rising tensions between the U.S. and China. NBC News’ Jacob Ward shares more about the ban on government devices due to data concerns.
